title: Forest
content: on reflection, here is where is where i think i finally started to hone into my style. i was creating more 'elaborate' renders, i haven't discovered adaptive subdivision yet so that's why the ground almost looks a little too smooth or just like flat, yk.

"i discovered poliigon by the blender guru from his blender tutorials as he promoted the hell out of it, and it has quite a lot of free photo-real textures and i tried something out with it, probably am not making the best use of them but w/e. this was still fun to make."

title: Poop Replacement Therapy
content: i made this render in blender and added some cool dashed lines in paint.net afterwards. this and "ball" were the only two pieces i made in this style but i think they both turned out pretty well. this also began my journey of posting funky abstract pieces.
this was also supposed to be album art but, lets be honest, i'll probably never finish the album

"making some experimental album called poop replacement therapy, probably will complete it more then half way through the year if i remember lol. i suck at long term projects especially when a lot of school work is in the way."

title: Glitch Art 0
content: back in september of 2019 i made a few pieces of glitch art with a few apps i found while just browsing on the play store, here is the first in the series of three that i squirt out.

title: zvava - I'm not racist but
content: imma just put it out there and say that i like dark humor, i don't condone killing babies and stuff but if you phrase it in the right way i'll laugh.

i made this partial cover of a song that i thought was a funny. i don't think it's funny because of its content but rather intelligently crafted, quoting the opening lyric, 'my dick is shaped like a rectangular prism, you know i love molesting kids with autism' - who rhymes prism with autism? god i love this song,,

title: Alex Ferro - You (Itro Remix) (zvava Remix)
content: a little remix i made in audacity, back in 2015-17 i was really into basic mashing of songs and this is the only one i'll leave up cause it actually kinda slaps.
